is_channel.title: Is channel
is_channel.description: A boolean value indicating whether this is a channel or not

created.title: Created
created.description: Date the channel was created. Date format is a unix timestamp

creator.title: Creator
creator.description: User ID of the member that created this channel

is_archived.title: Is archived
is_archived.description: A boolean value indicating whether the channel is archived or not

is_general.title: Is general
is_general.description: A boolean value indicating whether the channel is general or not

is_member.title: Is member
is_member.description: A boolean value indicating whether the calling member is a part of the channel or not

last_read.title: Last read
last_read.description: Time stamp when the channel is last read

latest.title: Latest
latest.description: Information about the latest item on the channel

user.title: User
user.description: User who has created the latest item. For example file, or message on the channel

type.title: Type
type.description: Type of the latest item. For example file, or message on the channel

subtype.title: Subtype
subtype.description: Subtype of the latest item. For example file, or message on the channel

text.title: Text
text.description: Text of the latest item. For example file, or message posted on the channel

unread_count.title: Unread count
unread_count.description: A full count of visible messages that the calling user has yet to read

unread_count_display.title: Unread count display
unread_count_display.description: A full count of visible messages that the calling user has yet to read

members.title: Members
members.description: All users belonging to the particular channel

creator.title: Creator
creator.description: The user ID of the member that created this channel

last_set.title: Last set
last_set.description: Unix time stamp of the last set topic

creator.title: Creator
creator.description: The user ID of the member that created the current purpose

last_set.title: last set
last_set.description: Unix time stamp of the last set purpose

num_members.title: Number of members
num_members.description: Number of users belonging to the channel

is_starred.title: Is starred
is_starred.description: A boolean value indicating whether the channel is starred or not
